event.title: Partecipi a Rust <3 Node + Node.js for home automation - RomaJS #AperiTech
event.description:
IMPORTANTE: per accedere facilmente agli spazi offerti da EnLabs è necessario registrare la propria presenza su: https://www.eventbrite.it/e/biglietti-rust-3-node-nodejs-for-home-automation-romajs-aperitech-43134572668 (https://www.eventbrite.it/e/biglietti-introduzione-ad-angular-2-all-you-can-store-romajs-aperitech-38539192763)

Oxidizing Node.js with Rust

There are some use cases where you need a systems language inside your Node.js application, which means writing code in C/C++. In this talk we'll see instead how to use Rust for writing safe and fast native Node.js modules.

Speaker: Enrico Risa

Hack together a basic nodejs interface for a smart outlet

This is going to be a collaborative effort between the partecipants and the speaker to try to create a basic nodejs interface that is able to connect and manage a ubiquity mPower pro.
It will be a useful exercise to see how we think and how we approach problems.

Speaker: Luca Lanziani

#AperiTech è un'iniziativa di Codemotion powered by LUISS ENLABS
